definitions.definition: ( architecture , military , historical ) Any of the upright projections between the embrasures of a battlement , originally for archers to shield behind while shooting arrows over the embrasures, or through loopholes in the merlons.

main_definition: ( architecture , military , historical ) Any of the upright projections between the embrasures of a battlement , originally for archers to shield behind while shooting arrows over the embrasures, or through loopholes in the merlons.

definitions.definition: Alternative spelling of merlin ( “ a small falcon , Falco columbarius ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative spelling of merlin ( “ a small falcon , Falco columbarius ” ) .
